scripts.migration:gen: npm run build && npm run typeorm:js -- migration:generate -d dist/config/data-source.js src/database/migrations/CreateInitialSchema
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npm run build:migrations && npm run typeorm:js -- migration:run -d dist/config/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && npm run build:migrations && npm run typeorm:js -- migration:revert -d dist/config/data-source.js
scripts.migration:show: npm run build && npm run build:migrations && npm run typeorm:js -- migration:show -d dist/config/data-source.js
